name: Fresh Mango Sago
author: zelash
summary: A delightful Asian dessert that's healthy and fresh and easy to make!
ingredients: 3  fresh honey mangoes, peeled and chopped
directions: Combine 4 cups water and sago pearls in a saucepan; bring to a boil
Cook and stir for about 3 minutes, remove saucepan from heat
Cover and let stand until sago pearls are semi-transparent, 2 to 3 minutes
Drain hot water from sago pearls in a strainer and rinse under cold running water until water runs clear
Blend 2 cups water, mangoes, evaporated milk, and sugar in a blender until thick and smooth; pour into a bowl and stir in sago pearls
Refrigerate until chilled, at least 30 minutes
